content: this gorgeous adalia scarf has such a beautiful shell pattern which gives it great texture it is made with less than one cakes of lion brand mandala yarn this pattern is one of the november contributions to the 2022 scarf of the month cal > this pattern is available for free on > my blog or purchase the ad-free pdf as > a digital download above **materials ** * approximately 421 yds of category 3 light weight yarn i used lion brand mandala in the genie colorway * size h mm furls streamline laurel wood crochet hook * yarn needle for weaving ends * scissors
